items.outofstockbehavior: Disallow back orders but display out-of-stock message
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

Prep for Install

  1. Clean the hair system and bio hair with Bond Breaker Shampoo, let dry.
  2. Apply 99% Alcohol to the scalp and the base of the system to prepare for optimal adhesion. Allow to completely evaporate.
  3. Apply Max Hold Sport or Scalp Protector to the scalp to enhance the tape’s bond strength and shield against skin irritation.

 

Applying the Tape

  1. Peel off the liner that is scored down the middle.
  2. Place the adhesive side toward the unit. Avoid touching the adhesive.
  3. Place the tape contour where desired on the hair system. Repeat as needed.
  4. When ready to apply to the scalp, peel off the remaining printed liner pieces. For easier application, spray Just-Rite Positioning Spray over the adhesive area to allow for more time to place and more precise placements.
  5. Press the hair system firmly onto the scalp, taking care not to move it in the process.

items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.displayname: Extenda-Bond Plus - 3/4" X 36 Yds, Roll With Holes
items.storedisplayname2: Extenda-Bond Plus - 3/4" X 36 Yds, Roll With Holes
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

Prep for Install

  1. Clean the hair system and bio hair with Bond Breaker Shampoo, let dry.
  2. Apply 99% Alcohol to the scalp and the base of the system to prepare for optimal adhesion. Allow to completely evaporate.
  3. Apply Max Hold Sport or Scalp Protector to the scalp to enhance the tape’s bond strength and shield against skin irritation.

 

Rolls

  1. Peel the tape from the roll and cut to the desired length.
  2. Place the adhesive side toward the unit. Avoid touching the adhesive.
  3. Place the tape piece where desired on the hair system. Repeat as needed.
  4. When ready to apply to the scalp, peel off the remaining white liner pieces. For easier application, spray Just-Rite Positioning Spray over the adhesive area to allow for more time to place and more precise placements.
  5. Press the hair system firmly onto the scalp, hold for at least 10 seconds.

items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.storedescription:
Prep for Install 

Shampoo the hair system and bio hair with Bond Breaker Shampoo and let dry. Apply 99% Alcohol to the scalp and the base of the system to prepare for optimal adhesion. Allow to completely evaporate. Apply Max Hold Sport or Scalp Protector to the scalp to enhance the tape’s bond strength and shield against skin irritation. 

 

Minis 

Peel off the color liner that is scored down the middle. Place the adhesive side toward the unit. Avoid touching the adhesive. Place the tape contour where desired on the hair system. Repeat as needed. When ready to apply to the scalp, peel off the remaining white liner pieces. For easier application, spray Just-Rite Positioning Spray over the adhesive area. The amount sprayed will determine the amount of time available to adjust the unit (the more you spray, the longer you have until the adhesive grabs). Press the hair system firmly onto the scalp, taking care not to move it in the process.

values.url: System Revitalizing Mist for Synthetic Hair
